item.title: Rory: LIV not signing anyone who moves needle

item.title: Sources: Kuminga demands trade from Warriors
item.description: Warriors forward Jonathan Kuminga has demanded a trade away from Golden State, league sources told ESPN.

item.title: Mavs' Flagg doubtful vs. Jazz with ankle sprain
item.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg is listed as doubtful for Thursday night's home game against the Utah Jazz due to a left ankle sprain.
